user_query: I'm planning a solo trip to Germany and I want to explore the cultural heritage of the biggest cities. Can you recommend the top five cities and the best train connections between them? Also, suggest some must-visit museums and art galleries in each city.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of the top five biggest cities in Germany known for their cultural heritage.
For each of the top five cities, query for notable museums and art galleries worth visiting.
Find the best train connections between the top five cities identified.
